name: X-Mas Impossible
description:
If audio is not playing click the game window a few times.

Deliver all presents while keeping the social distance. Travel through floors and hide in closets at the right time to avoid contact.

Controls

Move: W A S D or ← → ↑ ↓ keys
Roll: Space or Shift
Interact: E

Credits

Code: Milan Varady, Gabor Marton
Visuals: Gabor Marton
Voice acting: Milan Varady
